name: keywordsearch
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool google_keyword_scraper.
Tool description: Google Keyword Research
API description: Fetches popular keywords for a given language and country from the Google Keyword Scraper API.

glanguage.description:
you will use alpha code for any language you need: 

Afrikaans => \"af\"
Albanian => \"sq\"
Amharic => \"sm\"
Arabic => \"ar\"
Azerbaijani => \"az\"
Basque => \"eu\"
Belarusian => \"be\"
Bengali => \"bn\"
Bihari => \"bh\"
Bosnian => \"bs\"
Bulgarian => \"bg\"
Catalan => \"ca\"
Chinese (Simplified) => \"zh-CN\"
Chinese (Traditional) => \"zh-TW\"
Croatian => \"hr\"
Czech => \"cs\"
Danish => \"da\"
Dutch => \"nl\"
English => \"en\"
Esperanto => \"eo\"
Estonian => \"et\"
Faroese => \"fo\"
Finnish => \"fi\"
Fren

gcountry.description:
you will use only the alpha code of any country 

Afghanistan =>  \"af\"
Albania =>  \"al\"
Algeria =>  \"dz\"
American Samoa =>  \"as\"
Andorra =>  \"ad\"
Angola =>  \"ao\"
Anguilla =>  \"ai\"
Antarctica =>  \"aq\"
Antigua and Barbuda =>  \"ag\"
Argentina =>  \"ar\"
Armenia =>  \"am\"
Aruba =>  \"aw\"
Australia =>  \"au\"
Austria =>  \"at\"
Azerbaijan =>  \"az\"
Bahamas =>  \"bs\"
Bahrain =>  \"bh\"
Bangladesh =>  \"bd\"
Barbados =>  \"bb\"
Belarus =>  \"by\"
Belgium =>  \"be\"
Belize =>  \"bz\"
Benin =>

gkeyword.description: The keyword for which to fetch popular keywords.
